Class NacAlarm.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nfcalarmclock.alarm.NacAlarm.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    NacAlarm

    public static class NacAlarm.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper to build an alarm.
